title: The classic model of industrial location theory

content.question: The classic model of industrial location theory suggests that the primary consideration in the location of an industrial site is which of the following?

choices.label: The institutional structure of the firm
The cost to produce the product

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
